workflowName: Recruitment Workflow,"Identify the need, Job posting, Application screening, Interviews & assessments","Define job requirements, Write job descriptions, Post job on platforms, Review applications, Conduct interviews, Perform assessments"

IT Ticket Management Workflow,"Ticket creation, Ticket classification, Assign to technician/team, Analysis & diagnosis","Create ticket, Categorize ticket, Assign technician, Analyze issue, Diagnose problem"

New Product Launch Workflow,"Idea generation & market research, Product design & development, Validation & user testing","Brainstorm product ideas, Conduct surveys, Analyze market trends, Design prototype, Develop product, Conduct user testing"

Sales Process Workflow,"Lead generation, Initial contact, Presentation & demonstration","Generate leads, Research leads, Send outreach emails, Schedule meetings, Conduct presentations, Demonstrate product"
Invoice Processing Workflow,"Invoice reception, Internal approval, Accounting entry","Receive invoices, Verify invoice details, Approve invoice, Enter details into accounting system, Process payment"

Customer Onboarding Workflow,"Welcome email, Account setup, Product training, Support introduction","Send welcome email, Create user account, Set up initial preferences, Provide training materials, Introduce support team"

Project Management Workflow,"Project planning, Resource allocation, Execution, Monitoring & control, Project closure","Define project scope, Assign resources, Execute tasks, Track progress, Finalize project"

Employee Performance Review Workflow,"Goal setting, Performance tracking, Feedback collection, Review meeting, Final evaluation","Set performance goals, Monitor progress, Collect feedback, Conduct performance review, Evaluate final performance"

Event Planning Workflow,"Concept design, Vendor selection, Marketing & promotion, Event execution, Post-event follow-up","Design event concept, Choose vendors, Market event, Set up event, Conduct event, Send thank-you notes"

Product Support Workflow,"Ticket creation, Issue categorization, Solution search, Resolution, Customer feedback","Create support ticket, Categorize issue, Search for solutions, Provide resolution, Request customer feedback"
